title: Submission of Regulations issued under the Imports and Exports (Control) Act, No.1 of 1969 to Parliament for approval
decision_details:
- The proposal made by the Hon. President in his capacity as the Minister of Finance, Economic Stabilization and National Policies to submit the following Regulations issued under  the Imports and Exports (Control) Act, No. 1 of 1969 to Parliament, was approved by the Cabinet. 

*	the Imports and Exports (Control) Regulation No.12 of 2022 promulgated by the Gazette Notification dated 2022‑08‑23 enabling to import raw materials, equipment and utility vehicles required for some industries to ensure the imports of public sector and the continuation of operations of the selected sectors.

*	the Imports and Exports (Control) Regulation No.13 of 2022 promulgated by the Gazette Notification dated 2022‑08‑23 to suspend the importation of number of selected goods temporarily to manage the available limited forex liquidity as per the recommendation of the Central Bank.
